siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
After eating only one color food for 24 hours in this challenge it is time to spill some tea. Rebecca and Maddie are doing the never have I ever fondue challenge.  We find out if Maddie has a crush and do they have any crazy secrets.  Even though they are best friends and look like twins no one knows everything you do in 24 hours. Do you think someone will get scared and quit? Also, who will win and can they get along without fighting even if they aren't playing for $10,000?  

Watch - Dogs Play Among Us to Reveal Their Crush is Missing - PawZam Dogs https://youtu.be/yTU4bANPLEo

Follow us 
https://www.instagram.com/rebeccamaddiefitness
https://www.tiktok.com/@rebeccamaddiefitness

Rebecca Social Media
https://www.instagram.com/rebeccazamolo
TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@rebeccazamolo 

Maddie Social Media
https://www.instagram.com/maddiegray27
https://www.tiktok.com/@maddiegray27
blogPost.body:
After eating only one color food for 24 hours in this challenge it is time to spill some tea. Rebecca and Maddie are doing the never have I ever fondue challenge.  We find out if Maddie has a crush and do they have any crazy secrets.  Even though they are best friends and look like twins no one knows everything you do in 24 hours. Do you think someone will get scared and quit? Also, who will win and can they get along without fighting even if they aren't playing for $10,000?

localize.title: 从来没有我曾经的挑战，揭示真理！--丽贝卡-麦迪的挑战
localize.description:
在这次挑战中，24小时只吃一种颜色的食物，是时候撒点茶水了。丽贝卡和麦蒂正在做从来没有我曾经的火锅挑战。 我们发现，如果麦蒂有一个暗恋，他们有什么疯狂的秘密。 即使他们是最好的朋友，看起来像双胞胎，没有人知道你在24小时内做的一切。你认为有人会害怕并退出吗？此外，谁会赢，即使他们不是为了10000美元而玩，他们能不打架吗？ 

看--狗狗在我们中间玩耍揭秘暗恋对象失踪--爪赞狗https://youtu.be/yTU4bANPLEo。

关注我们 
https://www.instagram.com/rebeccamaddiefitness
https://www.tiktok.com/@rebeccamaddiefitness

丽贝卡社交媒体
https://www.instagram.com/rebeccazamolo
TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@rebeccazamolo 

Maddie 社交媒体
https://www.instagram.com/maddiegray27
https://www.tiktok.com/@maddiegray27

localize.title: 從來沒有我曾經的挑戰，揭示真理！--麗貝卡-麥迪的挑戰
localize.description:
在這次挑戰中，24小時只吃一種顏色的食物，是時候撒點茶水了。麗貝卡和麥蒂正在做從來沒有我曾經的火鍋挑戰。 我們發現，如果麥蒂有一個暗戀，他們有什麼瘋狂的祕密。 即使他們是最好的朋友，看起來像雙胞胎，沒有人知道你在24小時內做的一切。你認爲有人會害怕並退出嗎？此外，誰會贏，即使他們不是爲了10000美元而玩，他們能不打架嗎？ 

看--狗狗在我們中間玩耍揭祕暗戀對象失蹤--爪贊狗https://youtu.be/yTU4bANPLEo。

關注我們 
https://www.instagram.com/rebeccamaddiefitness
https://www.tiktok.com/@rebeccamaddiefitness

麗貝卡社交媒體
https://www.instagram.com/rebeccazamolo

next.excerpt:
Crepes are a not just a thin edible pancake. They're not a cake at all. They're a crepe. 

Subscribe: http://bit.ly/1HuynlY
Book + Merch: http://yousuckatcooking.com
http://instagram.com/yousuckatcooking
https://twitter.com/yousuckatcookin

RECIPE

1 large egg
⅓ up flour 
¾ cup milk 

This will make around 4 decent sized crepes 
Make raw egg pudding with the egg and flour 
Add a bit of the milk and Wangjangler until smooth 
Repeat until you have no milk left 
Let the batter sit for an hour if you're a baby who loves following the rules
Put a small amount of butter in a pan on medium heat, then wipe it out with a paper towel, or an expensive silk scarf 
Pour some batter in and swirl it. For a medium large pan around ¼ to ⅓ cup of batter will be enough. For a 37 foot pan you'll need ten gallons of batter 
Cook until crispy crusticles start to form 
Lift
Blow
Grab 
Flip
But you can probably skip blowing and also don't use your fingers if you're worried about burning yourself. Just use a spatula or try to flip it in the pan...but honestly good luck lol you're not that good at flipping. 
Cook the other side just a bit and then you know, stuff it or roll stuff in it, or fold stuff in it, or make crepe origami. Your call
next.title: Crepes - You Suck at Cooking (episode 123)

localize.description:
可丽饼是一种不只是薄薄的可食用的煎饼。他们不是一个蛋糕在所有。他们是一个薄饼。

订阅：http://bit.ly/1HuynlY
图书+商品：http://yousuckatcooking.com
http://instagram.com/yousuckatcooking
https://twitter.com/yousuckatcookin

食谱

1个大鸡蛋
⅓起面粉 
¾杯牛奶 

这将使大约4个大小的薄饼。
用鸡蛋和面粉做生鸡蛋布丁。
加入少许牛奶和旺壮乐，直到顺滑为止 
重复上述步骤，直到你没有牛奶了 
如果你是个爱循规蹈矩的宝宝，就把面糊放一个小时吧
锅中放少量黄油，然后用纸巾，或者昂贵的丝巾擦拭干净。
倒入一些面糊，搅拌一下。对于一个中等大的平底锅，大约1/4到⅓杯的面糊就足够了。对于一个37英尺的平底锅，你将需要10加仑的面糊。
烹调至开始形成脆皮。
电梯
吹
抢 
翻转
但你大概可以不吹，如果担心烫伤自己，也不要用手指。就用锅铲或者试着在锅里翻转......不过说实话运气不错lol你没那么好翻转。
煮另一面就好了，然后你知道，把它塞进去，或者在里面卷东西，或者在里面折东西，或者做折纸。你自己决定

可麗餅是一種不只是薄薄的可食用的煎餅。他們不是一個蛋糕在所有。他們是一個薄餅。

訂閱：http://bit.ly/1HuynlY
圖書+商品：http://yousuckatcooking.com
http://instagram.com/yousuckatcooking
https://twitter.com/yousuckatcookin

食譜

1個大雞蛋
⅓起麪粉 
¾杯牛奶 

這將使大約4個大小的薄餅。
用雞蛋和麪粉做生雞蛋布丁。
加入少許牛奶和旺壯樂，直到順滑爲止 
重複上述步驟，直到你沒有牛奶了 
如果你是個愛循規蹈矩的寶寶，就把麪糊放一個小時吧
鍋中放少量黃油，然後用紙巾，或者昂貴的絲巾擦拭乾淨。
倒入一些麪糊，攪拌一下。對於一箇中等大的平底鍋，大約1/4到⅓杯的麪糊就足夠了。對於一個37英尺的平底鍋，你將需要10加侖的麪糊。
烹調至開始形成脆皮。
電梯
吹
搶 
翻轉
但你大概可以不吹，如果擔心燙傷自己，也不要用手指。就用鍋鏟或者試着在鍋裏翻轉......不過說實話運氣不錯lol你沒那麼好翻轉。
煮另一面就好了，然後你知道，把它塞進去，或者在裏面卷東西，或者在裏面折東西，或者做摺紙。你自己決定
